tweet: Together w/ the #IOTACommunity, we closed off the year in our Review 2020 // Preview 2021 Meetup. Several members of the IOTA Foundation presented the amazing progress we have made with #IOTA. Thank you everyone for joining!  https://t.co/B8TZ3vpvMT

The distributed random number generation (dRNG) is an essential component of #Coordicide. Offering this feature natively in the #IOTA core protocol will secure and enable some very exciting use cases, including Oracles and Smart Contracts.
When the #IOTA coordicide update is integrated, safe and sound, will there be companies publicly declaring they put their money into it? That might be the start of a merciless run for tokens.

Hey #crypto are you aware that #IOTA has just released their new consensus on their testnet (see thread below), finalizing its #trilemma killer ? Meanwhile there're a lot of new deals being made behind the scenes...  https://t.co/VsAwTL2lg7

The Blackpin CEO was invited to a talk about outer space technology and startup life by the European Space Agency Business Incubation Centre and local TV channel RTF1, also briefly introducing their #IOTA-enabled messenger.  https://t.co/hTMn8jSBSu  Found by: The Librarian

I had a great time presenting at the #IOTA Christmas meetup last week hosted by the charming @io_terry and organised by the ever-dependable @iotashop.   If you want to hear about what we have planned for Firefly you can check out my talk here:  https://t.co/RJZj3mrb7Q
